item.name: Mana
item.description: The source of magic, can be used in many ways, mostly to enhance one's magic.

item.name: Dream Shard
item.description: Quartz formed by the merging of consciousnesses while traveling in the Dreamworld.

item.name: Furniture Coin
item.description: Glittering coins used to buy furniture for the Cottage.

item.name: Soul
item.description: Crystallized by magic, it is necessary for any Witch who intends to sign a Soul Contract. $B$$B$Used to summon new Dolls

item.name: Stamina Elixir
item.description: A mysterious, precious elixir found in the Chrono Tower. Consuming it will restore Stamina greatly as having a long rest.$B$$B$Restores 100% of maximum Stamina.
